entry.title: Quick post-LPW roundup
entry.summary: I've just arrived back from the London Perl Workshop. Lots of very interesting stuff. A big thank you to the organizers! I especially liked: Extending Syntax - Functional Programming meets Macros by LanX; The Internet of Personification by Matt S...
entry.content:
I've just arrived back from the London Perl Workshop. Lots of very interesting stuff. A big thank you to the organizers! I especially liked:

  • Extending Syntax - Functional Programming meets Macros by LanX;
  • The Internet of Personification by Matt S Trout; and
  • Rewriting the Apocalypse by osfameron.

There were some good lightning talks too. I liked:

  • IRC as glue for things by David Leadbeater; and
  • I am Developer by Paul Johnson.

For those of you who wanted a copy of my slides, they are on github.
